name: Truck Town (Elite games)
description:
Truck Town Welcome friend to the 6th game from Elite Games. 
In our new game u can drive three vehicles Mini van, Trailer truck, Tow truck The game doesn't have a lot in it because it was made in a short span of time but still its fun to play you can drive the vehicle flip it make it fly and lot the map in which it is played is not really bid because the theme of the jam was small island but its still fun to play in future i am thinking of make it better but for now is is simple (Also consiter downloading my game shooter fps alpha)
